1.title: Tramp Stamp Removal
1.plot: Nicole visits Dr. Tattoff to investigate removing her tramp stamp tattoo and hear some 'worst tattoo' horror stories.

2.title: Flower Game
2.plot: Growing up, Nicole always saw having flowers in your house as a sign of being adult so she visits celebrity florist Eric Buterbaugh for some tips on how to up her flower game.

3.title: Style Signals
3.plot: Nicole's girlfriend Erin Foster asks for help choosing an outfit for an upcoming first date, so Nicole enlists the help of her guy pal Ben Lyons to help them decipher the difference between dressing for the girls and dressing for the guys.

4.title: Homie Hopper
4.plot: Little sis Sofia and her friends school Nicole on just how out of touch she is with a lesson in slang and the newest social video apps.

5.title: Think Like a Drag Queen
5.plot: Nicole recently made a scene at the Met Gala with a jaw dropping white haired look. Style rebel RuPaul guests to talk about embracing your inner Drag Queen.

6.title: Bangs
6.plot: Nicole can't help but offer her advice on a hair transformation while she gets a cut from her favorite stylist, Andy Lecompte, at his West Hollywood salon.

7.title: Day with Dad (Special Guest: Lionel Richie)
7.plot: In honor of Father's Day, Nicole and Sofia spend the day with their dad, doing what he loves best.

8.title: Born to Dance
8.plot: Nicole has always wanted to be a background dancer, so she drops by Millenium Dance Studio where her friend Jeri Slaughter teaches her how to bust a move.

9.title: Piercing Pointers
9.plot: Nicole and her sister Sofia take a slight detour on the way home to get a new piercing - and learn what goes down behind closed doors at the piercing parlor.

10.title: Selfie How To
10.plot: Nicole and her glam squad learn how to take the perfect "selfie" self portrait on her camera phone.

11.title: Sleep Secrets
11.plot: Nicole visits a sleep specialist to make sure she's getting the most out of her downtime.

12.title: How Not to Pick Up a Guy
12.plot: Nicole's single gal pal Erin needs a little help on the dating front so Nicole takes her to a wine tasting to find her a man. The results aren't quite what she expected.

13.title: Pageant Obsessed
13.plot: Nicole is afraid she may have missed her chance to be a pageant queen, so she works with a top-notch pageant coach before facing some stiff competition.

14.title: A Little Pet Psychic Advice
14.plot: Nicole's plan to get into her dog Iro's head requires a little help from a pet psychic.

15.title: Nicole's New Workout
15.plot: The same old workouts are getting boring, so Nicole decides to change it up and check out a "cirque" workout.

16.title: Nicole's Big Audition
16.plot: Nicole's good friend Adam Shankman is casting for his new movie and has somehow overlooked Nicole for a starring role. She's determined to do whatever it takes to land the part.

17.title: Hoop Dreams
17.plot: Measuring in at a daunting five foot nothing, Nicole's never been a hot draft prospect for the NBA. Never one to let annoying details get in her way, she enlists Minnesota Timberwolves forward Lazar Hayward to help her work on her "game."

18.title: Nailed It
18.plot: Nicole's master manicurist Kimmie Kyees schools the gang on nail art, nail myths, and gives a MAN-icure to Nicole's guy pal, Derek Blasberg.

19.title: Nicole Knows Hip Hop
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: CLASSberg Is in Session
20.plot: Nicole's neighbors are celebrating a very important anniversary and when she decides to do something nice for them, her etiquette expert buddy Derek Blasberg steps in to save the day.

1.title: Nicole Richie Tries Her Hand at Magic
1.plot: Nicole has great memories of seeing Siegfried and Roy as a kid and dreams of having her own show in Las Vegas one day. She heads to the famous Magicopolis in Hollywood, where she becomes a magician's assistant and tries her best not to steal the show.

2.title: Richie Takes Over Seacrest's Show for a Day
2.plot: After spending the morning at 'On Air' with Ryan Seacrest, one thing is certain. If Mr. Seacrest ever needs someone to step in, Nicole's got him covered.

3.title: Richie Learns Synchronized Swimming from the Pros
3.plot: Water ballet must come naturally to a little mermaid like Nicole, right? She jumps into the deep end for a lesson in synchronized swimming.

4.title: Richie Gives Sign Spinning a Whirl
4.plot: Nicole is fascinated by the sign spinning entrepreneurs she sees on the road. She goes to the spinventor himself to pick up some skills.

5.title: Office Star Reveals His Writing Secrets
5.plot: Nicole Richie reads a lot of books to her kids. How hard could it be to write her own children's book? She talks to actor B.J. Novak.

6.title: Nicole Richie Gets Sent to the Penalty Box
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Richie Gets a Crash Course in Roller Derby
7.plot: Nicole is a stranger to the Roller Derby but all that changes when she visits the Derby Dolls for a crash course in the sport.

8.title: Richie Gets Hypnotized to Overcome Crippling Fear
8.plot: Nicole seeks the help of a hypnotist to overcome her crippling fear of being tickled...and maybe a few other things that bug her, too.

9.title: Richie Investigates Why Bees Are Disappearing
9.plot: Nicole and her friend Rivka visit The Valley Hive to investigate why bees have been disappearing lately, and pick up a couple treats along the way.

10.title: Nicole Gives Her Famous Father an Unwanted Surprise
10.plot: Nicole wants to help save the rapidly disappearing bees - but doesn't really want them at her house. Luckily, she has the perfect solution, much to her father's chagrin.

11.title: Nicole Richie Pulls Out All the Stops to Sell a $9M Home
11.plot: Nicole has worn a lot of different hats in her lifetime. Fashionista. Reality Star. And now Realtor. Nicole hosts an open house, using every trick in her repertoire to sell a $9-million home.

12.title: Nicole Richie Tries to Break Her Famous Father's Bad Habits
12.plot: Nicole has always been in touch with alternative medicine like acupuncture and cupping, so she always feels great. Her father on the other hand, could use some help. So Nicole signs Lionel Richie up for a session with Vicky, a body healer.

13.title: Richie Learns the Secrets Behind Film Special Effects
13.plot: In Los Angeles everything is fake, even what you hear. You won't believe your ears once Nicole masters the art of sound effects, taught by some of the top Foley artists in Hollywood.

14.title: Nicole Richie and Her Sister Duke It Out
14.plot: To be the best, you gotta beat the best. And after an intense Mixed Martial Arts training session - beating up on her sister Sofia, of course - the best is now Nicole Richie.

15.title: World Record
15.plot: Nicole and Rashida Jones set out to break a world record. Any world record. How hard can it be?

16.title: Making Faces
16.plot: Nicole's always been on the cutting edge of fashion and hairstyles, but her make up game hasn't been as strong. So she and her friend Little Esther meet with Kandee, a make up guru, to learn the foundations about foundation.

17.title: Richie Learns What It Takes to Be a Secret Agent
17.plot: Look out, Nicole Richie is right behind you. Or she will be, once she and friend Paul Scheer go to spy school. Tying her up, holding her at knife-point, and sneaky disguises won't stop Nicole now.

18.title: And We're Rolling
18.plot: Those who can do. Those who can't direct. Which is why Nicole goes behind the camera to direct her very own skateboarding movie starring Nyjah Huston, and, of course, Nicole herself.

19.title: What's My Sports Vibe
19.plot: When you're married to a sports nut, sometimes it helps to know a little about their favorite teams. Like, for instance, what sport the team plays. So Nicole sets out to learn everything there is to know about every single sport...in one sitting.

20.title: Down and Dirty
20.plot: One lady's trash is another lady's...renewable food source? Nicole doesn't know much about composting, but quickly learns you are what you eat - once you throw it away.
